<a class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item-link" href="https://www.liquor.com/rum-4779372">Rum</a>
</li>
<li class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item">
<a class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item-link" href="https://www.liquor.com/rye-whiskey-4779366">Rye Whiskey</a>
</li>
<li class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item">
<a class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item-link" href="https://www.liquor.com/scotch-4779368">Scotch</a>
</li>
<li class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item">
<a class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item-link" href="https://www.liquor.com/whiskey-4779365">Other Whiskey</a>
</li>

<a class="fullscreen-nav__sub-list-item-link" href="https://www.liquor.com/tequila-and-mezcal-4779374">Tequila &amp; Mezcal</a>
</li>

</li>

</ul>
</li>

<div class="comp heading" id="heading_1-0">
<h1 class="heading__title">Cosmopolitan</h1>
</div>
<div class="comp article-meta mntl-block" data-tracking-container="true" id="article-meta_1-0">
<div class="comp article-byline mntl-byline mntl-block" id="article-byline_1-0">
<span class="comp mntl-byline__text mntl-text-block" id="mntl-byline__text_1-0">
Written by</span>
<div class="comp mntl-byline__name mntl-block" id="mntl-byline__name_1-0">
<span class="comp mntl-byline__span mntl-text-block" id="mntl-byline__span_1-0">
Staff Author</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comp article-updated-date" id="article-updated-date_1-0">
<p class="article-meta__updated-label">Updated 08/25/17</p>
</div>
<div class="comp article-meta__feedback-container mntl-block" id="article-meta__feedback-container_1-0">

</div>
</div>
<div class="comp social-share-sticky-container mntl-block" id="social-share-sticky-container_1-0">
<ul class="comp social-share mntl-social-share share" data-description="The Cosmopolitan is a simple cocktail with a big history. </div>
</header>
<div class="article__body right-rail">
<div class="comp article-header__media primary-media figure-wrapper--article mntl-block" id="primary-media_1-0">
<figure class="comp figure" id="figure_2-0">
<div class="figure__media js-figure-media"> <div class="img-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:100.0%; height:0; background-color:#c7c7c7;"> <img class="figure__image js-figure-image" data-expand="300" src="https://www.liquor.com/thmb/ZdCK8zIDfRT30l11xSlXh-2EEJ4=/960x0/filters:no_upscale():max_bytes(150000):strip_icc()/__opt__aboutcom__coeus__resources__content_migration__liquor__2017__11__06100445__cosmopolitan-720x720-recipe-5e1384bd37044ec3ad4034cd811b78f3.jpg" url="https://www.liquor.com/recipes/cosmopolitan/"/> </div> <a class="pinit-btn" data-network="pinterest" data-pin-custom="true" data-pin-description="Modern Classics You Should Know: The Cosmopolitan" data-pin-do="skipLink" data-pin-media="https://www.liquor.com/thmb/KgmiUp46k_uwDIwKpSzpWX-oaY4=/735x0/__opt__aboutcom__coeus__resources__content_migration__liquor__2017__11__06100445__cosmopolitan-720x720-recipe-5e1384bd37044ec3ad4034cd811b78f3.jpg" data-pin-url="https://www.liquor.com/recipes/cosmopolitan/?utm_source=pinterest&amp;utm_medium=social&amp;utm_campaign=shareurlbuttons_nip" data-source="pinitBtn" data-type="sharePinterest" href="#" title="Pin to Pinterest"></a> </div></figure>
</div>
<div class="loc chop-content is-chopped" id="mntl-chop_1-0--chop-content" style="--chop-height: 99999999px">
<div class="comp article-intro text-passage structured-content article__header--project mntl-sc-page mntl-block" data-bind-scroll-on-start="true" data-sc-ad-label-height="11" data-sc-ad-track-spacing="100" data-sc-breakpoint="54em" data-sc-content-positions="[1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1]" data-sc-load-immediate="4" data-sc-max-track-height="600" data-sc-min-track-height="250" data-sc-sticky-offset="80" id="article__header--project_1-0">
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0">
<p>The legendary Cosmopolitan is a simple cocktail with a big history. It reached its height of popularity in the 1990s, when the HBO show “Sex and the City” was at its peak. The pink-hued Martini was a favorite of the characters on the show.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-1"></div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-2">
<p>According to Gary Regan, the original Cosmopolitan was created by South Beach bartender Cheryl Cook. Eager to invent a new cocktail for the Martini glass, Cook riffed on the classic Kamikaze using a newly introduced citrus-flavored vodka plus a splash of cranberry juice.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-3"></div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-4">
<p>There’s some debate about who created the original Cosmopolitan, whether it was Cook, Dale DeGroff (at New York City's Rainbow Room) or Toby Cecchini, who devised a Cosmo in 1988 during his tenure at NYC’s Odeon. However, all agree that Cecchini popularized the vodka-and-cranberry ’Tini.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-5"></div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_1-0-6">
<p>This recipe appeared as part of “<a data-component="link" data-ordinal="1" data-source="inlineLink" data-type="internalLink" href="/articles/indispensables-cosmopolitan">Let's Stop Pretending the Cosmopolitan Is a Terrible Drink. It Isn't.</a>"</p>
</div>
<div class="comp js-scads-inline-content ads-config mntl-block" id="ads-config_2-0">
<div class="comp ad-group-1 mntl-block" id="ad-group-1_1-0">
<div class="comp scads-to-load right-rail__item billboard-sticky billboard1-sticky-dynamic billboard-sticky--sc" data-breakpoint="medium2" data-height="1050" id="billboard1-sticky-dynamic_1-0">
<div class="spacer">
<div class="comp billboard1-dynamic mntl-gpt-dynamic-adunit mntl-gpt-adunit gpt billboard dynamic" id="billboard1-dynamic_1-0">
<div class="wrapper" data-auction-floor-id="49f8e0be594e460eb54b6823ba8cae82" data-auction-floor-value="75" data-pos="atf" data-priority="2" data-rtb="true" data-sizes='[[300, 250], [300, 600], [300, 1050], [1, 2], "fluid"]' data-targeting="{}" data-type="billboard" id="billboard"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="comp ad-group-2 mntl-block" id="ad-group-2_1-0">
<div class="comp scads-to-load right-rail__item billboard-sticky billboard2-sticky-dynamic billboard-sticky--sc" data-height="601" id="billboard2-sticky-dynamic_1-0">
<div class="spacer">
<div class="comp billboard2-dynamic mntl-gpt-dynamic-adunit mntl-gpt-adunit gpt billboard dynamic" id="billboard2-dynamic_1-0">
<div class="wrapper" data-auction-floor-id="cb75ca9155f64c54b4fb03e629813f80" data-auction-floor-value="75" data-pos="btf1" data-priority="3" data-rtb="true" data-sizes='[[300, 250], [300, 251], [300, 600], [300, 601], [2, 1], "fluid"]' data-targeting="null" data-type="billboard" id="billboard2"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="comp article__content structured-content structured-project-content mntl-block" id="structured-project-content_1-0">
<section class="comp section--ingredients section" id="section--ingredients_1-0">
<header class="section__header"><h2 class="section__title section__title--bold-underline">Ingredients</h2></header>
<div class="loc section-content section__content">
<ul class="comp text-passage ingredient-list simple-list simple-list--diamond" id="ingredient-list_1-0">
<li class="simple-list__item js-checkbox-trigger ingredient">
1 1/2 oz <a data-component="link" data-ordinal="1" data-source="inlineLink" data-type="internalLink" href="/spirit/vodka">Citrus vodka</a>
</li>
<li class="simple-list__item js-checkbox-trigger ingredient">
1 oz <a data-component="link" data-ordinal="1" data-source="inlineLink" data-type="internalLink" href="/brands/cointreau/">Cointreau</a>
</li>
<li class="simple-list__item js-checkbox-trigger ingredient">
1/2 oz Fresh lime juice
</li>
<li class="simple-list__item js-checkbox-trigger ingredient">
1 dash Cranberry juice
</li>
<li class="simple-list__item js-checkbox-trigger ingredient">
Garnish: Lime wheel
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</section>
<div class="comp js-lazy-ad native mntl-gpt-dynamic-adunit mntl-gpt-adunit gpt native dynamic" id="native_1-0">
<div class="wrapper" data-pos="native" data-priority="4" data-rtb="false" data-sizes='[[1, 3], "fluid"]' data-targeting="{}" data-type="native" id="native"></div>
</div>
<section class="comp section--instructions section" id="section--instructions_1-0">
<header class="section__header"><h2 class="section__title section__title--bold-underline">Steps</h2></header>
<div class="loc section-content section__content">
<div class="comp text-passage structured-content structured-project__steps mntl-sc-page mntl-block" data-bind-scroll-on-start="true" data-sc-ad-label-height="24" data-sc-ad-track-spacing="100" data-sc-breakpoint="54em" data-sc-content-positions="[300,600,900,1200,1500,1800,2100]" data-sc-load-immediate="1" data-sc-max-track-height="600" data-sc-min-track-height="250" data-sc-sticky-offset="60" id="structured-project__steps_1-0">
<ol class="comp mntl-sc-block-group--OL mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-startgroup" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0">
<li class="comp mntl-sc-block-group--LI mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-startgroup" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-1">
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-2">
<p>Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-3"></div>
</li>
<li class="comp mntl-sc-block-group--LI mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-startgroup" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-5">
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-6">
<p>Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-7"></div>
</li>
<li class="comp mntl-sc-block-group--LI mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-startgroup" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-9">
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-html" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-10">
<p>Garnish with a lime wheel.</p>
</div>
<div class="comp mntl-sc-block mntl-sc-block-adslot mntl-block" id="mntl-sc-block_2-0-11"></div>
</li>
</ol>
</div>
<div class="comp js-aggregate-rating feedback-block mntl-block" id="feedback-block_1-0">

<div class="comp has-right-label js-lazy-ad leaderboardfooter leaderboard--lazy mntl-lazy-flexible-ad mntl-flexible-ad mntl-gpt-adunit gpt leaderboard dynamic" id="leaderboardfooter_2-0">
<div class="wrapper" data-auction-floor-id="06fbbd77324b4676b33f8f0330880540" data-auction-floor-value="25" data-pos="ft1" data-priority="6" data-rtb="true" data-sizes='[[728, 90], [728, 98], [970, 250], [970, 258], [1, 9], "fluid"]' data-targeting="{}" data-type="leaderboard" id="leaderboardfooter"></div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">Mntl.utilities.scriptsOnLoad(document.querySelectorAll('script[data-glb-js="bottom"]'), function() {$.ajaxPrefilter(function (options, originalOptions, jqXHR) {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=bc4ac11ab768540a3794893ef5a00d14";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
}
else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "bc4ac11ab768540a3794893ef5a00d14" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "bc4ac11ab768540a3794893ef5a00d14" }));
}
}
});window.Mntl.externalizeLinks.addPlugin(window.Mntl.amazonAffiliateTagger);
window.Mntl.externalizeLinks.init();(function(Mntl) {
Mntl.Tooltip.init({
defaultPositionX: "auto",
defaultPositionY: "auto"
});
})(window.Mntl || {});});</script><div class="comp mntl-sponsor-tracking-codes" data-defer="load" data-defer-params="" id="mntl-sponsor-tracking-codes_1-0"></div>
</body>
